title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5703.5 - Payment of toll
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5703.5 - Payment of toll

State Regulations

All vehicles which intend to cross any bridge shall pay the
toll prescribed by the bridge toll rate schedule at the regularly established
place or booth for the collection of such tolls. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5703.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
